description: This file defines an interface IZigWave within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. The interface provides methods for managing ZigWave devices, including enabling/disabling device acceptance modes, retrieving device info, and managing device bindings. It appears to be part of a larger modular system for device communication and management.

classes.name: IZigWave
classes.description: An interface for managing ZigWave devices within the WPEFramework, providing methods for device acceptance, information retrieval, and binding operations.

methods.name: Permutable
methods.description: Checks whether a device at the specified address can be permuted (i.e., accepted or rejected) and outputs the current enabled state.

methods.name: Device
methods.description: Retrieves metadata for a device given its ID.

methods.name: Devices
methods.description: Returns an iterator over all currently available device IDs.

methods.name: Bind
methods.description: Creates a binding between a source and destination device.

methods.name: Unbind
methods.description: Removes a binding between a source and destination device.

ctags.name: IZigWave
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IZigWave : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
